title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.55 - Clearing account
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.55 - Clearing account

State Regulations
(a) A primary
account containing costs that are to be transferred or allocated to other
accounts. (b) An intermediate
account to which is transferred a group of costs or revenues, or a group of
accounts containing costs or revenues, and from which a distribution of the
total is made to other accounts. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.55

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
